EDB Postgres Advanced Server 12 is built on open-source PostgreSQL 12, which introduces myriad enhancements that enable databases to scale up and scale out in more efficient ways. 

EDB Postgres Advanced Server 12 adds a number of new outstanding features, including:

- Interval Partition
- Logical decoding on standby
- `COMPOUND TRIGGER`
- `MEDIAN` and `LISTAGG`
- `CAST_MULTISET`

The EDB Postgres Advanced Server (Advanced Server) documentation describes the latest version of Advanced Server 12 including minor releases and patches. The release notes in this section provide information on what was new in each release.
